required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Observation on Kuntai Capsule in Treating Early-onset Ovarian Hypofunction
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center Clinical Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Kuntai Capsule Alone and in Combination With Hormones in the Treatment of Early-onset Hypoovarian Function

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of Kuntai capsule alone or combined with hormone therapy in improving ovarian function in POI patients (including subclinical stage).

detailed_description.textblock: The study is expected to be conducted between 2021.08 and 2023.12.120 subjects with early-onset ovarian insufficiency will be randomly assigned to trial, control, or combination groups using a computer-generated randomization table.By comparing the data of primary efficacy indexes, secondary efficacy indexes and safety indexes before and after medication, The principal investigator will write and publish the paper.

primary_outcome.description: Changes of the level of FSH before and after treatment
Changes of the Kupperman score before and after treatment，Kupperman Score ranges from 0 to 69, with the smaller the score, the better off the subject

secondary_outcome.description: Changes of the level of LH before and after treatment
Changes of the level of Estradiol hormone before and after treatment
Changes of the AFC before and after treatment
Changes of the level of AMH before and after treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: The peak systolic blood flow velocity （PSV）
secondary_outcome.description: The peak systolic blood flow velocity before and after treatment was assessed by vaginal B ultrasound
The uterine artery end-diastolic blood flow velocity before and after treatment was assessed by vaginal B ultrasound
The uterine artery resistance index before and after treatment was assessed by vaginal B ultrasound

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with normal menstruation
secondary_outcome.description: To measure the ratio of patients have normal menstruation after treatment
To ask the patient if there is pregnancy (for patient who has pregnancy need)

arm_group.arm_group_label: POI patients who taking Kuntai capsule
arm_group.description: Patients in this group will take Kuntai capsule orally, 4 capsules each time, 3 times a day, and take the medicine for 3 months.

arm_group.arm_group_label: POI patients who accepting hormone therapy
arm_group.description: The estrogen and progesterone sequential regimen was adopted. The drug was estradiol tablets/estradiol didroxyprogesterone tablets (Femoston). Red tablets (estradiol, 1 mg/d) were taken in the first 14 days, and gray tablets (estradiol, 1 mg/d, dydrogesterone,10 mg/d) were taken in the last 14 days. 28 days was a course of treatment, and three courses of treatment were taken.

arm_group.arm_group_label: POI patients who taking Kuntai capsule combined with hormone therapy
arm_group.description: Kuntai capsule was taken at the same dose as Kuntai group on the basis of hormone therapy for 3 months.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Subclinical POI patients who taking Kuntai capsule
arm_group.description: Subclinical POI patients in this group which with Kuntai capsule intervention. This group is a self-controlled experiment before and after treatment

intervention.description: The instructions is pointed that each Kuntai capsule is 0.5g and the usage of Kuntai capsule is oral taking 4 capsules each time, 3 times a day, and 4 weeks is a course of treatment. The patients will taking 3 course of treatment in this study.
intervention.arm_group_label: POI patients who taking Kuntai capsule
POI patients who taking Kuntai capsule combined with hormone therapy
Subclinical POI patients who taking Kuntai capsule

intervention.description: The estrogen and progesterone sequential regimen was adopted. The Femoston was contain estradiol tablets and estradiol didroxyprogesterone tablets. Red tablets (estradiol, 1 mg/d) were taken in the first 14 days, and gray tablets (estradiol, 1 mg/d, dydrogesterone,10 mg/d) were taken in the last 14 days. 28 days was a course of treatment, and three courses of treatment were taken. The patients will taking 3 course of treatment in this study.
intervention.arm_group_label: POI patients who accepting hormone therapy
POI patients who taking Kuntai capsule combined with hormone therapy
intervention.other_name: Complex Packing Estradiol Tablets/Estradiol and Dydrogesterone Tablets

facility.name: The Second AffiliatedHospital of Nantong University
